attributes.action: Call an early general election due to rising public safety & security concerns
attributes.additional_details: Many people feel the UK is becoming unsafe, with reports of dangerous individuals entering the country illegally and being placed in communities without proper checks. There is growing concern that the needs of British citizens are being deprioritised, and trust in the Government’s ability to protect the public is rapidly declining. An early election is needed to restore confidence and national security.
attributes.background: We want the Government to call an early general election. Many people feel that current policies are failing to protect public safety and national security, and that the situation in the UK requires a new mandate from the public.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election now!" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
